string.value: Lots of people are having trouble going around the town because their tires are suddenly being stolen by sneaky creatures known as #b#o9420530##k. Who could retrieve all those stolen tires from these villains?

#b#p9270060##k is eager to bring those stolen tires back from #b#o9420530##k. Why don't you step up and save all those people from such an inconvenience? 

#o9420530# #r#a45471##k 
#t4000468# #r#c4000468#/50#k
#b#o9420530##k may seems disppeared for now, but you can never be sure if there won't be any more of them coming back to town and stealing things from innocent people.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 33,000 Able to proceed to 'Oly Oly is back!' as next quest.
You've noticed that the streets are emptier these days, no? It's because there are some impudent monsters going around town stealing tires from people's cars! Can you believe it?
They are #b#o9420530##k! Such sneaky creatures! What in the world do they do with all those stolen tires? There are many people who need their tires back!
Hope you can take down #b50 #o9420530#s#k and bring back #b50 #t4000468#s#k.
Well, I don't care what it takes, but I won't allow them to continue stealing people's tires.
You sure don't want to let those villains run around like this, do you?
Well, you sure have brought back enough tires to end your hunting. I'm so relieved.
My only wish is that those villains quit their stealing and leave us in peace.
Your hunting is not completed yet. Those #b#o9420530##k have stolen much more from us!
Your hunting is not completed yet...#b50 #o9420530##k can't be that much of a burden to you. C'mon!
